title: Afghan Red Cross workers killed by IS
text:
Afghan Red Cross workers killed by IS 8 February 2017 Close share panel Six Red Cross workers killed by so-called Islamic State group in northern Afghanistan 
This breaking news story is being updated and more details will be published shortly. Please refresh the page for the fullest version.
